title: Coronation Street accused of 'cheapening' Sinead's death with devastating twist
text:

Coronation Street has been accused of 'cheapening' Sinead Tinker's death with a devastating twist.

Terminally ill Sinead, who does not have long left to live, came to a horrifying realisation when she found Bethany Platt's notebook.

After reading a story about a young journalist who loved a man with a dying wife, Sinead realised that the story was actually a reality.

When Sinead asked why he was acting so flustered, panicking Daniel claimed she was "getting this all out of proportion".

Fuming Sinead said: "I knew I should have trusted my feelings. I asked her ages ago if something was going on between you two. She said 'no'."

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Daniel then made a worrying error when he claimed "there wasn't" anything going on, before quickly correcting himself with "there isn't".

He gave a knowing look that indicated that he had made a grave error, while Sinead's suspicions started to grow.

"What is it you're hiding from me," asked Sinead, but Daniel continued to insist nothing had happened.

Demanding the truth, Sinead said: "If we can’t be honest now then when can we, hey?

"Do you really want me going to my grave knowing that there’s something you’re keeping from me?"

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Realising he could not go on any longer, Daniel finally admitted that he kissed Bethany Platt.

With a sigh, he said: "Alright. We kissed."

Sinead looked horrified as she tried to process that her supposedly loving husband had kissed Bethany while she was dying at home.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Coronation Street viewers took to Twitter after watching the heartbreaking scene develop to question the latest twist.

One viewer said: "Why do #Corrie have to do this with Sinead and Daniel. She's about to die any day now and this is just cheapening the whole thing."

"Why have they done this? No need. Storyline needs to be out there for awareness but this is so wrong," added another.

A third said: "What a horrible thing to bring into the sinead/daniel storyline"

"This is daft now. Sinead on her death bed having a go at Daniel over Bethany. Gone are the emotional death scenes like when Hayley Cropper died. That was so much better written and acted and I was a wreck after. With this I just don’t care and that makes me sad," said a fourth.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

This came after Ken Barlow strongly warned his son not to say a word to Sinead about his kiss with Bethany.

Ken gave his son a stern telling off, but told him to keep quiet when Daniel claimed he was going to reveal all.

When Daniel asked how Ken thought he was feeling, his dad replied: "Terrible, I imagine. But that's the burden you have to bear. You have no right to ease it by passing it onto her."

*Coronation Street airs Mondays, Wednesday and Fridays on ITV at 7.30pm and 8.30pm
description: Daniel Osbourne made a sickening confession to his dying wife that horrified Coronation Street viewers
